content.text:
Mr. BOOKER. Mr. President, I was necessarily absent for the 
votes on confirmation of Executive Calendar No. 254 and the motion to 
invoke cloture on Executive Calendar No. 383.
  On vote No. 272, had I been present, I would have voted nay on the 
confirmation of Executive Calendar No. 254.
  On vote No. 273, had I been present, I would have voted nay on the 
motion to invoke cloture on Executive Calendar No. 383.
content.speaker: Mr. BOOKER
